Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time it takes for SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to occur after SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average duration of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision when preceded by SW-Reviewer Agreed in complex reviewer assignment variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants involving multiple reviewer declines or reminders
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time between the last SW-Reviewer Agreed event and the start of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision within each case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases where at least one reviewer agreed after two or more invitation reminders
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision following the completion of all assigned reviewersâ€™ agreements (i.e., after the final SW-Reviewer Agreed in a multi-reviewer context)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time between SW-AE Recommendation overdue and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision compared to the time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Recommendation overdue' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision versus total time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in the same variant families
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time between Manuscript Export Succeeded (post-revision) and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in revised submission variants that include SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include Assign a Different Editor versus those that do not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision when the preceding activity is SW-Reviewer Agreed versus when it is SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time for SW-Awaiting EIC Decision grouped by whether the variant includes a prior SW-EIC Major Revision or SW-EIC Minor Revision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and the end of the case
